name: Hanes Men's Ultimate Full-Zip Hoodie, Men's Hooded Fleece Sweatshirt with Zipper
product_description: Featuring our heaviest fleece, the Hanes Ultimate® full-zip hoodie keeps you warm and cozy. Crafted from a cotton-rich 9.7-oz. fleece that maintains its softness, this versatile men’s zip-up hoodie sweatshirt is an easy-on, easy-off wardrobe essential. Layer over your favorite tee and pair it with sweats or jeans for casual, yet cool style. Nothing beats the convenience of a full-zip jacket that is also a hooded sweatshirt. You'll like the ribbed cuffs with relaxed waistband and appreciate the patented low-pill, high-stitch density fabric. A split kanga pocket warms your hands or stores essentials while the roomy hood and drawcord cut the wind.

name: Amazon Essentials Hoodie For Men, Sherpa-Lined Full-Zip Fleece Sweatshirt
product_description: This sherpa hoodie for men offers a regular fit, providing an easy fit through the shoulders, chest, and waist. Crafted from an 8.3 oz brushed-back cotton-polyester blend, this men's full zip hoodie ensures warmth with its cozy sherpa-lined hood and body. The sleeves, lined with jersey, add an extra layer of comfort, making these essential hoodies perfect for chilly days. The hoodie features a full-length front zipper and stylish details, including metal grommets, a drawcord on the hood, and front pockets for practicality. Rib trim at the hem and cuffs enhances the fit and look. We value customer feedback and meticulously refine every aspect to make men’s hoodies of superior comfort, quality, and durability at an affordable price.
